title: Just delete Yasuo!
body: This champ is just utter cancer. 0s cd dash,windwall,aoe knockup and ult. So fun managing mana when this braindead worm can just spam away. I hope who ever created him and whoever plays him gets cancer. Tired of seeing him or his almost as horrible twin Zed every fucking game.

replies.body: I had to sign in just to downvote this and tell you what a horrible, horrible person you are. All of this hatred over a game and telling someone to get cancer.
And also, he's not even that bad. It's so easy to just crush him as any champ with an engage/disengage.
You don't even need that, anyone with sufficient burst, played properly can easily destroy yasuo

"LoL Trainer sent out Yasuo! R3d M0u53 sent out Talon!" 
>What will you do?
 Fight          Farm                                             
   Kite <             Rage

Talon used Kite! Evasiveness increased!
Enemy Yasuo used Q Tornado! The enemy's attack missed! 

>What will you do?
 Fight          Farm <                                            
   Kite              Rage

Talon used Farm! Talon leveled up!
>+85 HP
+3.1 AD
+2.7 AS
+.75 Regen
+3.5 Armor
+1.25 MR

Yasuo used Q Poke! It's not very effective...
>What will you do?
 Fight <        Farm                                            
   Kite              Rage

Yasuo used Q tornado! The enemy's attack missed! 
Talon used All-in Combo! It's super effective! A Critical hit!
The enemy's Yasuo fainted. 

R3d M0u53 defeated LoL Trainer! 
"wp"

Instead of insulting anyone who plays him and acting like he's unbeatable why don't you try experimenting with different champions?  You don't have to play the same type of champion into him every single game.

Personally I love picking Nasus into him.  Windwall does nothing against Mid Nasus.
imagine 20 years later your son decides to main yasuo...
Hey Buddy guess what i dnt like yas that much either ,   i just played against guess what i gave him first blood but hey i then proceed to beat him in lane and overall carry my team
Pick a bruiser against him.  Darius, mordekaiser, renekton.  he'll be toast
{{champion:33}} . Rush thornmail and sunfire. Laugh as he kills himself on you.
Not necessarily. If he uses grasp and builds phantom dancer and tri-force, its very possible for the yasuo to win the lane, if they yasuo knows the match up
Just try and  pick champions that are good against him, avoid close up fighting near minions and dodge that Steel Tempest move. I actually beat a Yasuo as Soraka mid so.. do your best dude!
Checks profile. Unranked. Explains a lot boys.

Literally, pick Malzahar and Yasuo is dead news. Unless he is smart enough to get a qss first item. But coming from your saltiness, I would say you are a bronzie who has no sense of how a champion works.
those were the vibes i was getting tbh
i feel like Riven Mid would be effective against him. E out of his Whirlwind, stun him when he gets close to you... no mana.... only thing to make sure of is to not R when his Windwall is off cd
